imdb.plot outline: Time traveler lives around with his Logbook - Marks in blue of - (un)certain journey. MARIO was sent by a parallel universe for the accomplishment of a mission although he has partial amnesia now. There are others who will try to sabotage it. His team seeks to help him in regaining his senses through coded messages sent in various forms and in different ways. Slowly, the messages will be revealed and it is up to MARIO to decipher the riddle before dawn. A satire of love in their encounters and misunderstandings, in their ups and downs.
imdb.title: Mario: High Heels with the History
akas: Mario: High Heels with the History (Brazil)
plot: MARIO was sent by a parallel universe for the accomplishment of a mission although he has partial amnesia. There are others who will try to sabotage it. His team seeks to help him in regaining his senses to decipher the riddle before dawn.::Alexandre Damiano Junior
